name: Banonkey Town
blurb: Banonkey Town, an action adventure game, has players scrambling to catch escaped monkeys and explore the hidden secrets of the town.

rewards.reward: We will send you a creative thank you e-card guaranteed to bring a smile to your face AND 3 Kickstarter exclusive, HD wallpapers (1 2D, 2 3D) for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device.
You will receive a copy of the game and all previous rewards.
Immerse yourself in the artistic development of Banonkey Town with our digital art book and all previous rewards.

Congratulations! You have entered the first tier of The Hall of Gratitude. Your name will appear in the game in a book that sits on a pillar at the entrance of Banonkey Town Hall. You will also receive all previous rewards.

At this level, you will be able to Beta Test Banonkey Town, give us feedback and influence the final product. Not only will you get your official Banonkey Town Zoo employee ID badge, but also you will have reached the second tier of The Hall of Gratitude, where your presence just got bigger. Your name will appear on a plaque on the walls of the main entrance of The Banonkey Town Hall of Gratitude (your name will only be included in this tier), plus all previous rewards.

You will receive an exclusive Kickstarter Banonkey coin, (choose 1 of 13) guaranteed to bring you all good things, AND you will experience the third tier of The Hall of Gratitude, where the light shines on you. Here you will be immortalized in a piece of art/artifact (likeness not guaranteed) that lines the wall (your name will only be included in this tier), and all previous rewards.

Thank you SO much for your help! You will receive a BanonKEY that opens the door to your heart and an invitation to the Oscar Level (fourth tier) of the Hall of Gratitude (your name will only be included in this tier). Deep inside its vaults are beautiful rooms with flowing fountains surrounded by exquisite artifacts with our patrons names, and all previous rewards.

Wow, we love you! Get the limited edition (Kickstarter only) Banonkey Town poster. You will also be welcomed into the fifth tier of The Hall of Gratitude, (your name will only be included in this tier), where we roll out the red carpet for our mighty, mighty contributors with pictures. Yes, the face of your choice will be captured eternally on the wall in a beautiful room, plus all previous gifts.

Shazam! You will be rewarded with the limited edition, beautiful Kickstarter 3-Character Banonkey miniature set. You have arrived at the sixth tier of The Hall of Gratitude, where we will dedicate a wing of Banonkey Town Hall in your name (and all previous rewards)!

Oh my, my... Not only will you receive 2 one-of-a-kind, exclusive Kickstarter Banonkey Town t-shirts, the limited edition, beautiful, Kickstarter 8-Character Banonkey miniature set (does not include miniatures from the $2,500 reward), but you have also reached the seventh tier of the Hall of Gratitude (your name will only be included in this tier). Can you hear the trumpets? Seriously, in this glorious chamber the trumpets will sound and the birds will sing as you gaze upon the portraits of these generous donors, (we can even make your face glow) and all previous gifts.

You are our hero! Oh ye founder of our fair town, you have arrived at the executive tier of The Hall of Gratitude, (your name will only be included in this tier). Here, we invite your creative suggestions to inspire (within reason), how you will be immortalized, the full set of 13 Banonkey Town coins, 2 Banonkey Town hoodies embroidered with your name AND you receive the complete 14 character, limited edition, Kickstarter Banonkey miniature set (does not include miniatures from $2,500 or $5,000 rewards), plus all previous rewards. HEY! That\u2019s not all. We will send you a hand-crafted, personalized, leather journal created by the Founder of our team, including a hand-drawn Banonkey Town piece of art signed by the concept artist and the whole Banonkey Team!  Please contact us directly for rewards over $10,000 at info@g-fold.com.
